typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	OecFileName as string ("FBHP_Eaas_Export_20221108104224.txt"),
	BlobContainer as string ("eaas-container"),
	BlobProcessingTemp as string ("oec/processing/temp")
}
source(output(
		application_id as long,
		MBI_SRC as string,
		DOB as timestamp,
		GENDER_CODE as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_INITIAL as string,
		PLAN_ID as string,
		CONTRACT_ID as string,
		SEGMENT_ID as string,
		ACCESSIBILITY_FORMAT_ID as string,
		APP_SOURCE_ID as integer,
		ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		ADDRESS_LINE3 as string,
		CITY as string,
		STATE as string,
		ZIP as string,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE3 as string,
		MAIL_CITY as string,
		MAIL_STATE as string,
		MAIL_ZIP as string,
		SUBSCRIBER_ID as string,
		PHONE as string,
		TITLE as string,
		COUNTY as string,
		EMAIL_ADDRESS as string,
		EMAIL_OPT_IN as string,
		EMERGENCY_CONTACT as string,
		EMERGENCY_PHONE as string,
		EMERGENCY_RELATIONSHIP as string,
		WORK_STATUS as string,
		SPOUSE_WORK_STATUS as string,
		PREMIUM_WITHHOLD as string,
		APPLICATION_DATE as timestamp,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_NAME as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_PHONE as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_ADDRESS as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_CITY as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_STATE as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_ZIP as string,
		Authorized_Rep_Relationship_id as string,
		PCP as string,
		RACE as string,
		ETHNICITY as string,
		CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID as long,
		ESRD as string,
		PART_D_RX_ID as string,
		FILE_ID as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT apidmax.application_id, ap.MBI AS MBI_SRC,DOB,GENDER_CODE,LAST_NAME,FIRST_NAME,MIDDLE_INITIAL,ap.PLAN_ID,CONTRACT_ID,SEGMENT_ID,ACCESSIBILITY_FORMAT_ID, APP_SOURCE_ID,ADDRESS_LINE1,ADDRESS_LINE2,ADDRESS_LINE3,CITY,STATE,ZIP,MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE1,MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE2,MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE3,MAIL_CITY,MAIL_STATE,MAIL_ZIP,SUBSCRIBER_ID,AP.PHONE,TITLE,COUNTY,EMAIL_ADDRESS ,EMAIL_OPT_IN  ,EMERGENCY_CONTACT,EMERGENCY_PHONE ,EMERGENCY_RELATIONSHIP ,WORK_STATUS,SPOUSE_WORK_STATUS ,PREMIUM_WITHHOLD,SUBMIT_TIME AS APPLICATION_DATE,AUTHORIZED_REP_NAME,AUTHORIZED_REP_PHONE ,AUTHORIZED_REP_ADDRESS ,AUTHORIZED_REP_CITY ,AUTHORIZED_REP_STATE ,AUTHORIZED_REP_ZIP ,Authorized_Rep_Relationship_id,PCP,RACE,ETHNICITY,CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID,CASE WHEN UPPER(ESRD) IN('YES','1','Y') THEN 'Y' WHEN UPPER(ESRD) IN('NO','2','N') THEN 'N' ELSE '' END AS ESRD,PART_D_RX_ID,AP.FILE_ID FROM [dbo].[TX_APPLICATION] AP INNER JOIN dbo.TX_FILE FL ON AP.FILE_ID=FL.FILE_ID INNER JOIN (select max(application_id) as APPLICATION_ID, MBI, PLAN_ID from [dbo].[TX_APPLICATION] group by MBI,PLAN_ID,SUBSCRIBER_ID) apidmax on ap.application_ID = apidmax.APPLICATION_ID where trim(FILE_NAME) ='"+$OecFileName+"'"),
	format: 'query') ~> DsOecAplication
source(output(
		MBI as string,
		GOLD_MEMBER_ID as long,
		PBP_NUMBER as string,
		EFFECTIVE_DATE_DISENROLLMENT as timestamp,
		REF2_Subscriber_Id as string,
		GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS_DESC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT MBI,GOLD_MEMBER_ID,PBP_NUMBER,EFFECTIVE_DATE_DISENROLLMENT,Subscriber_Id \n AS REF2_Subscriber_Id ,GST.GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS_DESC FROM [GOLD_MEMBER] GLD INNER JOIN [GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS] GST ON \nISNULL(GLD.GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS_ID,\'\')=ISNULL(GST.GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS_ID,\'\')',
	format: 'query') ~> RefGoldMember
source(output(
		WORK_QUEUE_ID as long,
		ACTIVITY_TYPE_ID as integer,
		ACTIVITY_OUTCOME_ID as integer,
		CREATED_BY as long,
		ACTIVITY_STATUS_ID as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select wq.WORK_QUEUE_ID,actp.ACTIVITY_TYPE_ID,ACTIVITY_OUTCOME_ID,CREATED_BY,1 as  ACTIVITY_STATUS_ID from [dbo].[REF_WORK_QUEUE] wq\ninner join (select 1 as idcol,ACTIVITY_TYPE_ID from [dbo].[REF_ACTIVITY_TYPE] where ACTIVITY_TYPE_NAME=\'Pre-BEQ Error\') actp on 1=actp.idcol\ninner join (select ACTIVITY_OUTCOME_ID from dbo.REF_ACTIVITY_OUTCOME where trim(ACTIVITY_OUTCOME)=\'Complete\') AO ON 1=1\nINNER JOIN (select USER_ID as CREATED_BY from dbo.CONFIG_USER where USERNAME=\'ETL\') CR ON 1=1\n where wq.WORK_QUEUE_NAME=\'Pre-BEQ Errors\' ',
	format: 'query') ~> WorkActivityType
source(output(
		{_col0_} as string
	),
	useSchema: false,
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: ($BlobContainer),
	folderPath: ($BlobProcessingTemp),
	fileName: ('MULTIPLE_MBI.txt'),
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false) ~> GoldMemberStatusCalculation
source(output(
		sep_reason_code as string,
		mbi as string,
		SUBSCRIBER_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("select t.sep_reason_code,t.mbi,SUBSCRIBER_ID from tx_application t join tx_file f on f.file_id=t.file_id where CHARINDEX(',',SEP_REASON_CODE)!=0 and file_name='"  + $OecFileName + "'"),
	format: 'query') ~> PreBEQTXSource
derivedGIldMbrStsforMultipleSEP, RefGoldMember join(SUBSCRIBER_ID == REF2_Subscriber_Id,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'both')~> GoldMemberJoin
selectGoldMemberData split(isNull(MBI),
	not(isNull(GOLD_MEMBER_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ApplicationInsert, ApplicationUpdate)
joinforgldmemberstatuscalculation derive(CreateDate = currentDate(),
		UpdateDate = currentDate(),
		GoldMbrStatusId = case (not(isNull(MBI_PreBeqError)) ,2,1),
		Credit_CovFlg = "Y",
		UnCovMonths = 0,
		LANGUAGE_CD = case( CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID==1,'ENG',
       CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID==2,'SPA',
       CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID==3,'OTH')) ~> GldMbrDerive
ConditionalSplit1@ApplicationUpdate split(EFFECTIVE_DATE_DISENROLLMENT == toTimestamp('12/31/9999','MM/DD/YYYY') || isNull(EFFECTIVE_DATE_DISENROLLMENT),
	disjoint: true) ~> SplitEnrollment@(DisEnrolledAndAccepted, ReEnrolled)
DerivedNullDisenrollmentDate select(mapColumn(
		MBI,
		DOB,
		GENDER_CODE,
		LAST_NAME,
		FIRST_NAME,
		MIDDLE_INITIAL,
		PLAN_ID,
		CONTRACT_ID,
		SEGMENT_ID,
		ACCESSIBILITY_FORMAT_ID,
		APP_SOURCE_ID,
		ADDRESS_LINE1,
		ADDRESS_LINE2,
		CITY,
		STATE,
		ZIP,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE1,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE2,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE3,
		MAIL_CITY,
		MAIL_STATE,
		MAIL_ZIP,
		SUBSCRIBER_ID,
		PHONE,
		TITLE,
		ADDRESS_LINE3,
		COUNTY,
		EMAIL_ADDRESS,
		EMAIL_OPT_IN,
		EMERGENCY_CONTACT,
		EMERGENCY_PHONE,
		EMERGENCY_RELATIONSHIP,
		WORK_STATUS,
		SPOUSE_WORK_STATUS,
		PREMIUM_WITHHOLD,
		APPLICATION_DATE,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_NAME,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_PHONE,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_ADDRESS,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_CITY,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_STATE,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_ZIP,
		Authorized_Rep_Relationship_id,
		PCP,
		CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID,
		ESRD,
		PART_D_RX_ID,
		CreateDate,
		UpdateDate,
		GoldMbrStatusId,
		Credit_CovFlg,
		UnCovMonths,
		LANGUAGE_CD,
		MBI,
		GOLD_MEMBER_ID,
		PBP_NUMBER,
		EFFECTIVE_DATE_DISENROLLMENT,
		PREM_WITHHOLD_OPTION_PART_CD = PREMIUM_WITHHOLD,
		APPLICATION_ID = application_id,
		ELECTION_TYPE_CODE,
		ENROLLMENT_EFFECTIVE_DATE,
		DISENROLLMENT_REASON_CODE,
		RACE,
		ETHNICITY
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
SplitEnrollment@DisEnrolledAndAccepted derive(ErrorMessage = "Multiple Applications Received for Member",
		DueDate = currentDate() +1,
		CREATED_ON = currentDate()) ~> DeriveActVal
DeriveActVal, WorkActivityType join(1 == 1,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'both')~> JnWorkAct
SplitEnrollment@ReEnrolled derive(EFFECTIVE_DATE_DISENROLLMENT = toDate(null()),
		GoldMbrStatusId = 1,
		ELECTION_TYPE_CODE = toString(null()),
		ENROLLMENT_EFFECTIVE_DATE = toDate(null()),
		DISENROLLMENT_REASON_CODE = toString(null())) ~> DerivedNullDisenrollmentDate
GoldMemberJoin select(mapColumn(
		application_id,
		MBI,
		DOB,
		GENDER_CODE,
		LAST_NAME,
		FIRST_NAME,
		MIDDLE_INITIAL,
		PLAN_ID,
		CONTRACT_ID,
		SEGMENT_ID,
		ACCESSIBILITY_FORMAT_ID,
		APP_SOURCE_ID,
		ADDRESS_LINE1,
		ADDRESS_LINE2,
		ADDRESS_LINE3,
		CITY,
		STATE,
		ZIP,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE1,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE2,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE3,
		MAIL_CITY,
		MAIL_STATE,
		MAIL_ZIP,
		SUBSCRIBER_ID,
		PHONE,
		TITLE,
		COUNTY,
		EMAIL_ADDRESS,
		EMAIL_OPT_IN,
		EMERGENCY_CONTACT,
		EMERGENCY_PHONE,
		EMERGENCY_RELATIONSHIP,
		WORK_STATUS,
		SPOUSE_WORK_STATUS,
		PREMIUM_WITHHOLD,
		APPLICATION_DATE,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_NAME,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_PHONE,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_ADDRESS,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_CITY,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_STATE,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_ZIP,
		Authorized_Rep_Relationship_id,
		PCP,
		CLIENT_LANGUAGE_ID,
		ESRD,
		PART_D_RX_ID,
		FILE_ID,
		GOLD_MEMBER_ID,
		PBP_NUMBER,
		EFFECTIVE_DATE_DISENROLLMENT,
		CreateDate,
		UpdateDate,
		GoldMbrStatusId,
		Credit_CovFlg,
		UnCovMonths,
		LANGUAGE_CD,
		MBI_SRC,
		GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS_DESC,
		RACE,
		ETHNICITY
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectGoldMemberData
GoldMemberStatusCalculation select(mapColumn(
		MBI_PreBeqError = {_col0_}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> renamecol
DsOecAplication, renamecol join(MBI_SRC == MBI_PreBeqError,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinforgldmemberstatuscalculation
PreBEQTXSource select(mapColumn(
		sep_reason_code,
		mbi_MUltipleSEP = mbi,
		REF_SUBSCRIBER_ID = SUBSCRIBER_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectPREBEQMultipleSEP
GldMbrDerive, selectPREBEQMultipleSEP join(SUBSCRIBER_ID == REF_SUBSCRIBER_ID,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> joinMulSEP
joinMulSEP derive(GoldMbrStatusId = case(not(isNull(mbi_MUltipleSEP)),2,GoldMbrStatusId)) ~> derivedGIldMbrStsforMultipleSEP
ConditionalSplit1@ApplicationInsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		GOLD_MEMBER_ID as long,
		MBI as string,
		PBP_NUMBER as string,
		DOB as timestamp,
		GENDER_CODE as string,
		TITLE as string,
		LAST_NAME as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_INITIAL as string,
		ELECTION_TYPE_CODE as string,
		CONTRACT_NUMBER as string,
		DISENROLLMENT_REASON_CODE as string,
		ENROLLMENT_EFFECTIVE_DATE as timestamp,
		EFFECTIVE_DATE_DISENROLLMENT as timestamp,
		SEGMENT_ID as string,
		PART_D_OPT_OUT_FLAG as string,
		MMP_OPT_OUT_FLAG as string,
		EGHP_FLAG as string,
		APPLICATION_DATE as timestamp,
		CALCULATED_APPLICATION_DATE as timestamp,
		ESRD_OVERRIDE as string,
		PREM_WITHHOLD_OPTION_PART_CD as string,
		CREDITABLE_COV_FLAG as string,
		NUMBER_UNCOVERED_MONTHS as string,
		EMPLOYER_SUB_ENROLLMENT_OVERRIDE_FLAG as string,
		PREFERRED_LANG_NO_ENGLISH as string,
		ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT_CODE as string,
		SECONDARY_DRUG_INS_FLAG as string,
		SECONDARY_RX_ID as string,
		SECONDARY_RX_GROUP as string,
		ROLLED_FROM_CONTRACT as string,
		SOURCE_TYPE_CODE as string,
		ROLLED_FROM_PBP as string,
		PART_D_RX_BIN as string,
		PART_D_RX_PCN as string,
		PART_D_RX_GROUP as string,
		PART_D_RX_ID as string,
		SECONDARY_DRUG_BIN as string,
		SECONDARY_DRUG_PCN as string,
		RESIDENCE_ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		RESIDENCE_ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		RESIDENCE_ADDRESS_LINE3 as string,
		ADDRESS_CRUD_FLAG as string,
		RESIDENCE_CITY as string,
		RESIDENCE_STATE as string,
		RESIDENCE_ZIP as string,
		RESIDENCE_ZIP4 as string,
		COUNTY as string,
		EMAIL_ADDRESS as string,
		EMAIL_OPT_IN as string,
		PHONE as string,
		EMERGENCY_CONTACT as string,
		EMERGENCY_PHONE as string,
		EMERGENCY_RELATIONSHIP as string,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE1 as string,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE2 as string,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE3 as string,
		MAIL_CITY as string,
		MAIL_STATE as string,
		MAIL_ZIP as string,
		END_DATE as timestamp,
		CARA_STATUS_CRUD_FLAG as string,
		DRUG_CLASS as string,
		NOTIFICATION_START_DATE as timestamp,
		NOTIFICATION_END_DATE as timestamp,
		POS_EDIT_STATUS as string,
		POS_EDIT_CODE as string,
		PRESCRIBER_LIMITATION_STATUS as string,
		PHARMACY_LIMITATION_STATUS as string,
		IMPLEMENTATION_START_DATE as timestamp,
		IMPLEMENTATION_END_DATE as timestamp,
		IC_MODEL_START_DATE as timestamp,
		IC_MODEL_CRUD_FLAG as string,
		IC_MODEL_TYPE_IND as string,
		IC_MODEL_BENEFIT_STATUS_CODE as string,
		IC_MODEL_END_DATE as timestamp,
		IC_MODEL_END_DATE_REASON_CODE as string,
		GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS_ID as integer,
		SUBSCRIBER_ID as string,
		ESRD_CODE as string,
		HOSPICE_CODE as string,
		DTRR_EFFECTIVE_DATE as timestamp,
		DTRR_END_DATE as timestamp,
		DIALYSIS_START_DATE as timestamp,
		DIALYSIS_END_DATE as timestamp,
		HOSPICE_START_DATE as timestamp,
		HOSPICE_END_DATE as timestamp,
		MEDICARE_PART_A_ENTITLEMENT_START_DT as timestamp,
		MEDICARE_PART_A_ENTITLEMENT_END_DT as timestamp,
		MEDICARE_PART_B_ENTITLEMENT_START_DT as timestamp,
		MEDICARE_PART_B_ENTITLEMENT_END_DT as timestamp,
		PART_D_LOW_INC_SUB_LEVL_CODE as string,
		LOW_INC_COPAY_CAT_CODE as string,
		ESRD_START_DATE as timestamp,
		ESRD_END_DATE as timestamp,
		TRANSPLANT_START_DATE as timestamp,
		TRANSPLANT_END_DATE as timestamp,
		TRANSPLANT_FAILURE_DATE as timestamp,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		WORK_STATUS as string,
		SPOUSE_WORK_STATUS as string,
		DOD as timestamp,
		DISABILITY_CODE as string,
		INSTITUTIONALIZED_CODE as string,
		INST_NHC_START_DATE as timestamp,
		LOW_INC_PERIOD_EFF_DATE as timestamp,
		LOW_INC_PERIOD_END_DATE as timestamp,
		MSP_PERIOD_START_DATE as timestamp,
		MSP_PERIOD_END_DATE as timestamp,
		CUM_NUM_UNCOV_MNTHS as string,
		MEDICAID_STATUS as string,
		PART_C_ENROLLMENT_START_DATE as timestamp,
		PART_C_ENROLLMENT_END_DATE as timestamp,
		PART_D_ELIG_START_DATE as timestamp,
		PART_D_ELIG_END_DATE as timestamp,
		PREM_WITHHOLD_OPTION_START_DT as timestamp,
		PREM_WITHHOLD_OPTION_END_DT as timestamp,
		DISABILITY_EFFECTIVE_DATE as timestamp,
		DISABILITY_END_DATE as timestamp,
		PREMIUM_WITHHOLD_STATUS_DATE as timestamp,
		MAINTENANCE_CODE as string,
		CREATED_ON as timestamp,
		UPDATED_ON as timestamp,
		UID as string,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_START_DATE as timestamp,
		RESIDENCE_ADDRESS_START_DATE as timestamp,
		INCARCERATION_START_DATE as timestamp,
		INCARCERATION_END_DATE as timestamp,
		NOT_LAWFUL_PRESENCE_START_DATE as timestamp,
		NOT_LAWFUL_PRESENCE_END_DATE as timestamp,
		OCCURRENCE as integer,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_NAME as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_PHONE as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_ADDRESS as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_CITY as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_STATE as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_ZIP as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_RELATIONSHIP_ID as string,
		PCP as string,
		LANGUAGE as string,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_EXPIRE_DATE as date,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_RECEIVED_DATE as date,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_DOCTYPE_ID as integer,
		PRODUCT_CLASS as string,
		RESIDENCE_ADDRESS_END_DATE as timestamp,
		MAILING_ADDRESS_END_DATE as timestamp,
		LEP_START_DATE as timestamp,
		LEP_END_DATE as timestamp,
		PART_D_LATE_ENROLL_PEN_AMT as decimal(9,2),
		PART_D_LATE_ENROLL_WAIVE_AMT as decimal(9,2),
		PART_D_LATE_ENROLL_PEN_SUB_AMT as decimal(9,2),
		APPLICATION_ID as long,
		SC_CODE_START_DATE as timestamp,
		SC_CODE_END_DATE as timestamp,
		STATE_CODE as string,
		COUNTY_CODE as string,
		PART_C_PREMIUM_AMT as decimal(12,3),
		LOW_INC_PART_D_SUB_AMT as decimal(12,3),
		PART_D_PREMIUM as decimal(12,3),
		PREMIUM_WITHHOLD as string,
		PRODUCT_GROUP as string,
		HOSPICE_PROVIDER_NUMBER as string,
		LOW_INC_SUB_SOURCE_CODE as string,
		MCAID_START_DATE as timestamp,
		MCAID_END_DATE as timestamp,
		TRANSPLANT_CODE as string,
		PRODUCT_SUBGROUP as string,
		HCBS_CODE as string,
		HCBS_START_DATE as timestamp,
		HCBS_END_DATE as timestamp,
		TRANA_ABII_CODE as string,
		TRANA_ABII_START_DATE as timestamp,
		TRANA_ABII_END_DATE as timestamp,
		INST_NHC_CODE as string,
		INST_START_DATE as timestamp,
		INST_END_DATE as timestamp,
		INST_NHC_END_DATE as timestamp,
		DISENROLLMENT_SEP_CMS_REASON_CODE as string,
		ORIGINAL_EFFECTIVE_DATE as timestamp,
		SECONDARY_PHONE as string,
		UPDATED_BY as string,
		MBI_START_DATE as timestamp,
		MBI_END_DATE as timestamp,
		PART_D_PREMIUM_START_DATE as timestamp,
		PART_D_PREMIUM_END_DATE as timestamp,
		MEDICAID_CRAF as string,
		PART_C_PREMIUM_END_DATE as timestamp,
		PART_C_PREMIUM_START_DATE as timestamp,
		PART_D_RX_EFFECTIVE_DATE as timestamp,
		PART_D_RX_END_DATE as timestamp,
		MSP_CODE as string,
		RACE_CODE as string,
		ETHNICITY_CODE as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	postSQLs:[("UPDATE TX_APPLICATION SET APP_STATUS_ID=1 FROM GOLD_MEMBER GLD INNER JOIN  [dbo].[TX_APPLICATION] AP ON AP.APPLICATION_ID=GLD.APPLICATION_ID INNER JOIN TX_FILE FL ON AP.FILE_ID=FL.FILE_ID where trim(FILE_NAME) ='"+$OecFileName+"'")],
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		MBI = MBI_SRC,
		DOB,
		GENDER_CODE,
		LAST_NAME,
		FIRST_NAME,
		MIDDLE_INITIAL,
		PBP_NUMBER = PLAN_ID,
		CONTRACT_NUMBER = CONTRACT_ID,
		SEGMENT_ID,
		ACCESSIBLE_FORMAT_CODE = ACCESSIBILITY_FORMAT_ID,
		RESIDENCE_ADDRESS_LINE1 = ADDRESS_LINE1,
		RESIDENCE_ADDRESS_LINE2 = ADDRESS_LINE2,
		RESIDENCE_ADDRESS_LINE3 = ADDRESS_LINE3,
		RESIDENCE_CITY = CITY,
		RESIDENCE_STATE = STATE,
		RESIDENCE_ZIP = ZIP,
		CREATED_ON = CreateDate,
		GOLD_MEMBER_STATUS_ID = GoldMbrStatusId,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE1,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE2,
		MAIL_ADDRESS_LINE3,
		MAIL_CITY,
		MAIL_STATE,
		MAIL_ZIP,
		SUBSCRIBER_ID,
		CREDITABLE_COV_FLAG = Credit_CovFlg,
		NUMBER_UNCOVERED_MONTHS = UnCovMonths,
		PHONE,
		TITLE,
		RESIDENCE_ADDRESS_LINE3 = ADDRESS_LINE3,
		COUNTY,
		EMAIL_ADDRESS,
		EMAIL_OPT_IN,
		EMERGENCY_PHONE,
		EMERGENCY_CONTACT,
		EMERGENCY_RELATIONSHIP,
		WORK_STATUS,
		SPOUSE_WORK_STATUS,
		APPLICATION_DATE,
		AUTHORIZED_REP_NAME,
